what: Unified Input and Output for Processing of Metabolomic Profiling Experiments
title: Unified Input and Output for Processing of Metabolomic Profiling Experiments
text: Unified Input Output Processing Metabolomic Profiling Experiments

title: Unified Input and Output for Processing of Metabolomic Profiling Experiments
text: profilePro package provides unified input output interface eRah xcms packages processing GC-MS LC-MS metabolic profiling experiments

title: Unified Input and Output for Processing of Metabolomic Profiling Experiments
text: profilePro package can installed GitHub using following:

title: Unified Input and Output for Processing of Metabolomic Profiling Experiments
text: package documentation can browsed online https://jasenfinch.github.io/profilePro/. believe ’ve found bug profilePro, please file bug (, possible, reproducible example) https://github.com/jasenfinch/profilePro/issues.

title: Profiling processing results class — MetaboProfile-class
text: S4 class store profile processing results

title: Profiling processing results class — MetaboProfile-class
text: version package version creation_date date time initiation processing file_paths list file paths used processing. Vectors files form different aquisition modes labelled accordingly. processing_parameters object class ProfileParameters containing parameters processing sample_info tibble containing runinfo data data list containing tibbles processed data processing_results list containing processing results

title: Profile processing parameters class — ProfileParameters-class
text: S4 class store profile processing parameters.

title: Profile processing parameters class — ProfileParameters-class
text: technique profiling technique use. Defaults result availableTechniques()[1] processing_parameters list containing parameters use processing

title: Available techniques — availableTechniques
text: List techniques available processing.

title: Available techniques — availableTechniques
text: character vector techniques.

what: ProfileParameters get and set methods — technique
title: ProfileParameters get and set methods — technique
text: Get set profile processing parameters

title: ProfileParameters get and set methods — technique
code: technique(x)  technique(x) <- value  processingParameters(x)  processingParameters(x) <- value  # S4 method for ProfileParameters technique(x)  # S4 method for ProfileParameters technique(x) <- value  # S4 method for ProfileParameters processingParameters(x)  # S4 method for ProfileParameters processingParameters(x) <- value

title: ProfileParameters get and set methods — technique
text: x S4 object class ProfileParameters value value set

title: Plot ion chromatogram — plotChromatogram
text: Plot ion chromatogram MetaboProfile.

title: Plot ion chromatogram — plotChromatogram
code: plotChromatogram(   processed_data,   cls = NULL,   group = FALSE,   alpha = 1,   aggregationFun = "max",   ... )  # S4 method for MetaboProfile plotChromatogram(   processed_data,   cls = NULL,   group = FALSE,   alpha = 1,   aggregationFun = "max",   ... )

title: Plot ion chromatogram — plotChromatogram
text: processed_data S4 object class MetaboProfile cls sample information column use plot colours. group average samples within groups. cls NULL, plot average chromatogram across samples. alpha plot line transparancy alpha aggregationFun value pass xcms::chromatogram() chromatogram type. Defaults base peak ("max"). ... arguments pass erah::plotChr()

title: Plot total ion counts — plotTIC
text: Plot sample total ion counts.

title: Plot total ion counts — plotTIC
code: plotTIC(processed, by = "injOrder", colour = "block")  # S4 method for MetaboProfile plotTIC(processed, by = "injOrder", colour = "block")

title: Plot total ion counts — plotTIC
text: processed S4 object class MetaboProfile info column plot colour info column provide colour labels

title: Profiling paramters — profileParameters
text: Initiate default processing parameters given profiling technique.

title: Profiling paramters — profileParameters
text: technique profiling technique initiate parameters

title: Profiling paramters — profileParameters
text: S4 object class ProfileParameters.

title: Profiling paramters — profileParameters
code: profileParameters('LCMS-RP') #> Processing parameters for technique LCMS-RP  #>  #> info: #> name class  #>  #> peakDetection: #> Object of class:  CentWaveParam  #>  Parameters: #>  - ppm: [1] 8.2 #>  - peakwidth: [1] 16 43 #>  - snthresh: [1] 7 #>  - prefilter: [1]   3 100 #>  - mzCenterFun: [1] "apex" #>  - integrate: [1] 2 #>  - mzdiff: [1] 0.001 #>  - fitgauss: [1] FALSE #>  - noise: [1] 0 #>  - verboseColumns: [1] FALSE #>  - roiList: list() #>  - firstBaselineCheck: [1] TRUE #>  - roiScales: numeric(0) #>  - extendLengthMSW: [1] FALSE #>  #> retentionTimeCorrection: #> Object of class:  ObiwarpParam  #>  Parameters: #>  - binSize: [1] 0.7 #>  - centerSample: integer(0) #>  - response: [1] 1 #>  - distFun: [1] "cor_opt" #>  - gapInit: [1] 2.9 #>  - gapExtend: [1] 2.7 #>  - factorDiag: [1] 2 #>  - factorGap: [1] 1 #>  - localAlignment: [1] FALSE #>  - initPenalty: [1] 0 #>  - subset: integer(0) #>  - subsetAdjust: [1] "average" #>  #> grouping: #> Object of class:  PeakDensityParam  #>  Parameters: #>  - sampleGroups: [1] "class" #>  - bw: [1] 1 #>  - minFraction: [1] 0.6666667 #>  - minSamples: [1] 1 #>  - binSize: [1] 0.00775 #>  - maxFeatures: [1] 50 #>  #> infilling: #> Object of class:  FillChromPeaksParam  #>  Parameters: #>  - expandMz: [1] 0 #>  - expandRt: [1] 0 #>  - ppm: [1] 0 #>  - fixedMz: [1] 0 #>  - fixedRt: [1] 0 #>

title: profileProcess — profileProcess
text: process metabolomic profiling data

title: profileProcess — profileProcess
text: file_paths character vector file paths use processing sample_info tibble containing sample info parameters object class ProfileParameters containing parameters processing

title: profileProcess — profileProcess
text: S4 object class MetaboProfile

title: profileProcess — profileProcess
code: if (FALSE) { # LCMS-RP example using the faahKO package data ## Retrieve file paths file_paths <- list.files(   system.file("cdf",              package = "faahKO"),   full.names = TRUE,   recursive = TRUE)[1:2]   file_names <- basename(file_paths) sample_names <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(file_names)  ## Generate sample information table sample_info <- tibble(fileOrder = seq_along(file_paths),                       injOrder = seq_along(file_paths),                       fileName = file_names,                       batch = 1,                       block = 1,                       name = sample_names,                       class = substr(sample_names,1,2))  ## Generate profiling parameters parameters <- profileParameters('LCMS-RP') processingParameters(parameters)$peakDetection <- CentWaveParam(snthresh = 20,                                                                  noise = 1000) processingParameters(parameters)$retentionTimeCorrection <- ObiwarpParam() processingParameters(parameters)$grouping <- PeakDensityParam(sampleGroups = sample_info$class,                                                               maxFeatures = 300,                                                               minFraction = 2/3) ## Specify parallel processing plan plan('sequential')  ## Process data processed_data <- profileProcess(file_paths,sample_info,parameters)  # GCMS-XCMS example using the gcspikelite package data ## Retrieve file paths file_paths <- list.files(   system.file('data',             package = 'gcspikelite'),   pattern = '.CDF',   full.names = TRUE)[1:2] file_names <- basename(file_paths) sample_names <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(file_names)  ## Generate sample information table sample_info <- tibble(fileOrder = seq_along(file_paths),                       injOrder = seq_along(file_paths),                       fileName = file_names,                       batch = 1,                       block = 1,                       name = sample_names,                       class = targets$Group[1:2])  ## Generate profiling parameters parameters <- profileParameters('GCMS-XCMS')  ## Specify parallel processing plan plan('sequential')  ## Process data processed_data <- profileProcess(file_paths,sample_info,parameters)  # GCMS-eRah example using the gcspikelite package data ## Retrieve file paths file_paths <- list.files(   system.file('data',             package = 'gcspikelite'),   pattern = '.CDF',   full.names = TRUE)[1:2] file_names <- basename(file_paths) sample_names <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(file_names)  ## Generate sample information table sample_info <- tibble(fileOrder = seq_along(file_paths),                       injOrder = seq_along(file_paths),                       fileName = file_names,                       batch = 1,                       block = 1,                       name = sample_names,                       class = targets$Group[1:2])  ## Generate profiling parameters parameters <- profileParameters('GCMS-eRah')  ## Specify parallel processing plan plan('sequential')  ## Process data processed_data <- profileProcess(file_paths,sample_info,parameters) }

title: profilePro 0.8.1
text: Temporarily use jasenfinch/BiocParallel.FutureParam pull request package installation error due update BiocParallel version 1.30.0. Removed readr Imports field package DESCRIPTION.

title: profilePro 0.8.0
text: Added missing import MSnbase::.MSnExp.OnDiskMSnExp(). Re-export plan() future package. parallel processing back-end xcms processing now specified using plan() future package. enabled BiocParallel.FutureParam package. Removed nCores argument profileParameters(). Removed patchwork dependency.

title: profilePro 0.7.1
text: Removed parallel arguments erah processing routine now support use future package. Fixed LC-MS processing routine single ionisation mode present. Fixed plotChromatogram() single ionisation mode data. Added unit tests GC-MS processing using xcms. Improved plotting aesthetics plotChromatogram() plotTIC().

title: profilePro 0.7.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added pkgdown site available https://jasenfinch.github.io/profilePro/ magrittr::%>% now re-exported. Improved console output profilePro::profileProcess(). Added full examples profilePro::profileProcess(). nCores argument can now supplied profilePro::profileProcess() select number cores use parallel processing. Added profilePro::availableTechniques() list available processing techniques package. MetaboProfile S4 class now inherits ProfileParameters S4 class. Added get set methods MetaboProfile S4 class. Added get set methods ProfileParamters S4 class. Added validators MetaboProfile S4 class ensure sample information contains correct fields file names specified paths match sample information. Added unit tests
